pageContext.claim: “So, I was seated next to the wife of Prime Minister Abe [Shinzo Abe of Japan], who I think is a terrific guy, and she’s a terrific woman, but doesn’t speak English. Like, not 'hello.'”
pageContext.analysis: Akie Abe, the wife of Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, does speak basic English, including greetings like "hello." However, in diplomatic settings, she appears to be more comfortable with speaking Japanese.
